title: Just a PBE Question
body: I just wanted to know out of curiosity is there a difference between a PBE application sent 2 years ago vs one sent a week ago? Like does one have a higher priority over newer/older applications? It's been a long time and neither me or any of my friends have been accepted yet I hear a few recent players being accepted... ;-;

replies.body: There isn't a difference in applications, so submitting one now isn't different than one from 2 years ago.  I know you've waited a long time, but it's not something we can force or expedite.  Best of luck!
